course_title: Researching Local History from the Ground Up

101.comments: Students will not be required to attend any real-time classes in HIST 304; all required learning materials and activities will be accessible and completed asynchronously online, with optional virtual drop-in sessions held from 2-3:20pm (Pacific time) on Thursdays. There is no cost for textbooks in this course.

description: Sources and methods for reconstructing local history that can be used by Social Studies teachers in B.C. The aim is to develop an appreciation of the formative processes and past experiences that created one's familiar community.
